member.name: T:NCrontab.CrontabField
member.summary: Represents a single crontab field.

member.name: M:NCrontab.CrontabField.Parse(NCrontab.CrontabFieldKind,System.String)
member.summary: Parses a crontab field expression given its kind.

member.name: M:NCrontab.CrontabField.Seconds(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a crontab field expression representing seconds.

member.name: M:NCrontab.CrontabField.Minutes(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a crontab field expression representing minutes.

member.name: M:NCrontab.CrontabField.Hours(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a crontab field expression representing hours.

member.name: M:NCrontab.CrontabField.Days(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a crontab field expression representing days in any given month.

member.name: M:NCrontab.CrontabField.Months(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a crontab field expression representing months.

member.name: M:NCrontab.CrontabField.DaysOfWeek(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a crontab field expression representing days of a week.

member.name: M:NCrontab.CrontabField.GetFirst
member.summary: Gets the first value of the field or -1.

member.name: M:NCrontab.CrontabField.Next(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the next value of the field that occurs after the given start value or -1 if there is no next value available.

member.name: M:NCrontab.CrontabField.Contains(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines if the given value occurs in the field.

member.name: M:NCrontab.CrontabField.Accumulate``1(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,``0,System.Func{NCrontab.ExceptionProvider,``0})
member.summary: Accumulates the given range (start to end) and interval of values into the current set of the field.
member.remarks: To set the entire range of values representable by the field, set and to -1 and to 1.

member.name: T:NCrontab.CrontabSchedule
member.summary: Represents a schedule initialized from the crontab expression.

member.name: M:NCrontab.CrontabSchedule.GetNextOccurrences(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Enumerates all the occurrences of this schedule starting with a base time and up to an end time limit. This method uses deferred execution such that the occurrences are only calculated as they are enumerated.
member.remarks: This method does not return the value of itself if it falls on the schedule. For example, if is midnight and the schedule was created from the expression * * * * * (meaning every minute) then the next occurrence of the schedule will be at one minute past midnight and not midnight itself. The method returns the next occurrence after . Also, is exclusive.

member.name: M:NCrontab.CrontabSchedule.GetNextOccurrence(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the next occurrence of this schedule starting with a base time.

member.name: M:NCrontab.CrontabSchedule.GetNextOccurrence(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the next occurrence of this schedule starting with a base time and up to an end time limit.
member.remarks: This method does not return the value of itself if it falls on the schedule. For example, if is midnight and the schedule was created from the expression * * * * * (meaning every minute) then the next occurrence of the schedule will be at one minute past midnight and not midnight itself. The method returns the next occurrence after . Also, is exclusive.

member.name: M:NCrontab.CrontabSchedule.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string in crontab expression (expanded) that represents this schedule.

member.name: M:NCrontab.CrontabScheduleExtensions.GetNextOccurrences(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{NCrontab.CrontabSchedule},System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Generates a sequence of unique next occurrences (in order) between two dates based on one or more schedules.

member.name: M:NCrontab.CrontabScheduleExtensions.GetNextOccurrences``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{NCrontab.CrontabSchedule},System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Func{NCrontab.CrontabSchedule,System.DateTime,``0})
member.summary: Generates a sequence of next occurrences (in order) between two dates and based on one or more schedules. An additional parameter specifies a function that projects the items of the resulting sequence where each invocation of the function is given the schedule that produced the occurrence and the occurrence itself.

remarks.para: The resulting sequence can contain duplicate occurrences if multiple schedules produce the same occurrence.

member.name: T:NCrontab.ExceptionProvider
member.summary: Represents the method that will generate an object.

member.name: M:NCrontab.Extensions.DistinctUntilChanged``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer{``0})
member.summary: Iterates over the given sequence and yields the first occurrence of each consecutively repeating element, e.g. [1, 2, 2, 3, 3, 3, 2, 4] → [1, 2, 3, 2, 4].

member.name: M:NCrontab.Schedule.GetOccurrences``2(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Func{``0,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.DateTime}},System.Func{``0,System.DateTime,``1})
member.summary: Generates a sequence of occurrences based on one or more schedules.

member.name: M:NCrontab.Schedule.Merge``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{``0,System.DateTime}},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{``0,System.DateTime}})
member.remarks: The schedules, and , are expected to produce a timeline of unique occurrences in order of earliest to latest time. The behaviour is otherwise undefined.
